treatment-md.title: Aeminium ludgeri Trovao, Tiago, Soares, Paiva, Mesquita, Coelho, Catarino, Gil & Portugal, 2019, sp. nov.
treatment-md.article-title: Description of Aeminiaceae fam. nov., Aeminium gen. nov. and Aeminiumludgeri sp. nov. (Capnodiales), isolated from a biodeteriorated art-piece in the Old Cathedral of Coimbra, Portugal
